00008 #include "CTantalusRay.h"

00015 #include "engine/vorticon/ai/CRay.h"

00017 #include "engine/vorticon/ai/CEarthChunk.h"

00019 unsigned int rnd(void);
00020 
00021 const int TANTALUS_SPRITE = 58;
00022 const int SHOT_SPD_X = (42*6);
00023 const int SHOT_SPD_Y = (18*6);
00024 
00025 const int EARTHCHUNK_BIG_UP = 64;
00026 const int EARTHCHUNK_BIG_DN = 66;
00027 const int EARTHCHUNK_SMALL_UP = 68;
00028 const int EARTHCHUNK_SMALL_DN = 70;
00029 
00030 CTantalusRay::CTantalusRay(CMap &Map, std::vector<CObject*> &vect_obj, CObjectAI &objectai) :
00031 CFinale(Map),
00032 m_mustsetup(true),
00033 m_alternate_sprite(0),
00034 mp_MessageBox(new CMessageBox("Uh-Oh")),
00035 m_vect_obj(vect_obj),
00036 m_objectai(objectai),
00037 m_timer(0),
00038 mp_Bitmap(g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("GAMEOVER")),
00039 mp_process(&CTantalusRay::shootray)
00040 {
00041  g_pGfxEngine->pushEffectPtr( new CVibrate(2000) );
00042 }
00043 
00044 void CTantalusRay::process()
00045 {
00046  if(mp_MessageBox)
00047  {
00048   mp_MessageBox->process();
00049 
00050   if(mp_MessageBox->isFinished())
00051   {
00052    delete mp_MessageBox;
00053    mp_MessageBox = NULL;
00054   }
00055  }
00056  else
00057  {
00058   (this->*mp_process)();
00059  }
00060 }
00061 
00062 void CTantalusRay::shootray()
00063 {
00064  if(m_mustsetup)
00065  {
00066   CMapLoader Maploader(&m_Map);
00067   Maploader.load(2,81, m_Map.m_gamepath, false);
00068 
00069   while(!m_vect_obj.empty())
00070   {
00071    delete m_vect_obj.back();
00072    m_vect_obj.pop_back();
00073   }
00074 
00075   m_Map.drawAll();
00076 
00077   CObject* ShootObject = new CRay(&m_Map, 4<<CSF, 4<<CSF, RIGHT, OBJ_NONE, 0);
00078   ShootObject->solid = false;
00079   ShootObject->exists = ShootObject->onscreen = true;
00080   m_vect_obj.push_back(ShootObject);
00081   mp_ShootObject = m_vect_obj.back();
00082   g_pSound->playSound(SOUND_KEEN_FIRE, PLAY_NOW);
00083 
00084   m_mustsetup = false;
00085  }
00086  else
00087  {
00088   mp_ShootObject->moveRight(SHOT_SPD_X);
00089   mp_ShootObject->moveDown(SHOT_SPD_Y);
00090   shot_x = mp_ShootObject->getXPosition();
00091   shot_y = mp_ShootObject->getYPosition();
00092   int x = (shot_x>>STC)-160;
00093   int y = (shot_y>>STC)-100;
00094   if( x>0 && y>0 )
00095    m_Map.gotoPos( x, y);
00096 
00097   mp_ShootObject->sprite = TANTALUS_SPRITE + m_alternate_sprite;
00098   m_alternate_sprite ^= 1;
00099 
00100   if( (shot_x>>CSF) >= 47)
00101   {
00102    m_vect_obj.pop_back();
00103    m_mustsetup = true;
00104    m_step = 0;
00105    mp_process = &CTantalusRay::explodeEarth;
00106   }
00107  }
00108 }
00109 
00110 void CTantalusRay::explodeEarth()
00111 {
00112  if (!m_timer)
00113  {
00114   if (m_step<16)
00115   {
00116    CEarthExplosion *EarthExplosion;
00117    EarthExplosion = new CEarthExplosion(&m_Map,shot_x+((rnd()%32)<<STC), shot_y+((rnd()%32)<<STC)-(8<<STC));
00118    EarthExplosion->solid = false;
00119    m_vect_obj.push_back(EarthExplosion);
00120   }
00121 
00122   CEarthChunk *chunk;
00123 
00124   switch(m_step)
00125   {
00126   case 5:
00127    for(int i=0;i<=9;i++)
00128    {
00129     chunk = new CEarthChunk(&m_Map,shot_x+(14<<STC), shot_y);
00130     chunk->m_Direction = EC_UPLEFTLEFT;
00131 
00132     if (i > 4)
00133      chunk->sprite = (i > 4) ? EARTHCHUNK_SMALL_DN : EARTHCHUNK_SMALL_UP;
00134     m_vect_obj.push_back(chunk);
00135    }
00136 
00137    break;
00138   case 6:
00139    chunk = new CEarthChunk(&m_Map,shot_x+(16<<STC), shot_y+(16<<STC));
00140    m_vect_obj.push_back(chunk);
00141    break;
00142   case 7:
00143    chunk = new CEarthChunk(&m_Map,shot_x+(24<<STC), shot_y-(8<<STC));
00144    m_vect_obj.push_back(chunk);
00145   case 8:
00146    chunk = new CEarthChunk(&m_Map,shot_x+(16<<STC), shot_y+(4<<STC));
00147    m_vect_obj.push_back(chunk);
00148   case 10:
00149    // spawn four big fragments of the earth to go flying off
00150    chunk = new CEarthChunk(&m_Map,shot_x+(8<<STC), shot_y);
00151    chunk->m_Direction = EC_UPLEFT;
00152    chunk->sprite = EARTHCHUNK_BIG_UP;
00153    chunk->solid = false;
00154    m_vect_obj.push_back(chunk);
00155 
00156    chunk = new CEarthChunk(&m_Map,shot_x+(8<<STC), shot_y);
00157    chunk->m_Direction = EC_UPRIGHT;
00158    chunk->sprite = EARTHCHUNK_BIG_UP;
00159    chunk->solid = false;
00160    m_vect_obj.push_back(chunk);
00161 
00162    chunk = new CEarthChunk(&m_Map,shot_x+(8<<STC), shot_y);
00163    chunk->m_Direction = EC_DOWNRIGHT;
00164    chunk->sprite = EARTHCHUNK_BIG_DN;
00165    chunk->solid = false;
00166    m_vect_obj.push_back(chunk);
00167 
00168    chunk = new CEarthChunk(&m_Map,shot_x+(8<<STC), shot_y);
00169    chunk->m_Direction = EC_DOWNLEFT;
00170    chunk->sprite = EARTHCHUNK_BIG_DN;
00171    chunk->solid = false;
00172    m_vect_obj.push_back(chunk);
00173 
00174    // Hide the Earth!!!
00175    for(int ex = 0; ex<3 ; ex++)
00176     for(int ey = 0; ey<3 ; ey++)
00177      m_Map.changeTile((shot_x>>CSF)+ex, (shot_y>>CSF)+ey, 561);
00178    break;
00179   case 32:
00180    while(!m_vect_obj.empty())
00181    {
00182     delete m_vect_obj.back();
00183     m_vect_obj.pop_back();
00184    }
00185    m_mustfinishgame = true;
00186    break;
00187   }
00188 
00189   m_step++;
00190   m_timer = 5;
00191  }
00192  else m_timer--;
00193 
00194  m_objectai.process();
00195 }
